resources.string:
ShoeStore fashionable, comfort, and trendy footwear Brand,
 with a quality and affordable prices, aims to inspire with the latest fashion trends.
 Encompassing a distinct contemporary and modem style,
 providing a large variety of ladies shoes and bags. 
 Each collection illustrates our commitment to balancing essential pieces with the season's iconic trends, 
 always maintaining a focus on wear ability, quality and style.

Feel free to navigate the list until you find the shoes you like \nthan tap it to show Shoe Details(avilible sizes, price , prand , etc) and order it \n also there is a floating plus button at the end of screen in shoe list in case you want to sell your own products in our app
